ca.uhn.fhir.rest.client

Class RestfulClientFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uhn.fhir.rest.client.RestfulClientFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRestfulClientFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApacheRestfulClientFactory

    public abstract class RestfulClientFactory
extends Object
implements IRestfulClientFactory
    Base class for a REST client factory implementation

    • Method Detail

      • getConnectionRequestTimeout

        public int getConnectionRequestTimeout()
        Description copied from interface: IRestfulClientFactory
        Gets the connection request timeout, in milliseconds. This is the amount of time that the HTTPClient connection pool may wait for an available connection before failing. This setting typically does not need to be adjusted.

        The default value for this setting is defined by IRestfulClientFactory.DEFAULT_CONNECTION_REQUEST_TIMEOUT

        Specified by:
        getConnectionRequestTimeout in interface IRestfulClientFactory

      • getConnectTimeout

        public int getConnectTimeout()
        Description copied from interface: IRestfulClientFactory
        Gets the connect timeout, in milliseconds. This is the amount of time that the initial connection attempt network operation may block without failing.

        The default value for this setting is defined by IRestfulClientFactory.DEFAULT_CONNECT_TIMEOUT

        Specified by:
        getConnectTimeout in interface IRestfulClientFactory

      • getProxyUsername

        protected String getProxyUsername()
        Return the proxy username to authenticate with the HTTP proxy
        Parameters:
        The - proxy username

      • getProxyPassword

        protected String getProxyPassword()
        Return the proxy password to authenticate with the HTTP proxy
        Parameters:
        The - proxy password

      • setProxyCredentials

        public void setProxyCredentials(String theUsername,
                                String thePassword)
        Description copied from interface: IRestfulClientFactory
        Sets the credentials to use to authenticate with the HTTP proxy, if one is defined. Set to null to use no authentication with the proxy.
        Specified by:
        setProxyCredentials in interface IRestfulClientFactory
        Parameters:
        theUsername - The username
        thePassword - The password

      • getServerValidationMode

        public ServerValidationModeEnum getServerValidationMode()
        Description copied from interface: IRestfulClientFactory
        Gets the server validation mode for any clients created from this factory. Server validation involves the client requesting the server's conformance statement to determine whether the server is appropriate for the given client.

        The default value for this setting is defined by IRestfulClientFactory.DEFAULT_SERVER_VALIDATION_MODE

        Specified by:
        getServerValidationMode in interface IRestfulClientFactory

      • getSocketTimeout

        public int getSocketTimeout()
        Description copied from interface: IRestfulClientFactory
        Gets the socket timeout, in milliseconds. This is the SO_TIMEOUT time, which is the amount of time that a read/write network operation may block without failing.

        The default value for this setting is defined by IRestfulClientFactory.DEFAULT_SOCKET_TIMEOUT

        Specified by:
        getSocketTimeout in interface IRestfulClientFactory

      • getPoolMaxTotal

        public int getPoolMaxTotal()
        Description copied from interface: IRestfulClientFactory
        Gets the maximum number of connections allowed in the pool.

        The default value for this setting is defined by IRestfulClientFactory.DEFAULT_POOL_MAX

        Specified by:
        getPoolMaxTotal in interface IRestfulClientFactory

      • getPoolMaxPerRoute

        public int getPoolMaxPerRoute()
        Description copied from interface: IRestfulClientFactory
        Gets the maximum number of connections per route allowed in the pool.

        The default value for this setting is defined by IRestfulClientFactory.DEFAULT_POOL_MAX_PER_ROUTE

        Specified by:
        getPoolMaxPerRoute in interface IRestfulClientFactory

      • newClient

        public <T extends IRestfulClient> T newClient(Class<T> theClientType,
                                              String theServerBase)
        Instantiates a new client instance
        Specified by:
        newClient in interface IRestfulClientFactory
        Parameters:
        theClientType - The client type, which is an interface type to be instantiated
        theServerBase - The URL of the base for the restful FHIR server to connect to
        Returns:
        A newly created client
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - If the interface type is not an interface

      • validateConfigured

        protected void validateConfigured()
        Called automatically before the first use of this factory to ensure that the configuration is sane. Subclasses may override, but should also call super.validateConfigured()

        public void setConnectionRequestTimeout(int theConnectionRequestTimeout)
        Description copied from interface: IRestfulClientFactory

        The default value for this setting is defined by IRestfulClientFactory.DEFAULT_CONNECTION_REQUEST_TIMEOUT

        Specified by:
        setConnectionRequestTimeout in interface IRestfulClientFactory

        The default value for this setting is defined by IRestfulClientFactory.DEFAULT_CONNECT_TIMEOUT

        Specified by:
        setConnectTimeout in interface IRestfulClientFactory

      • setFhirContext

        public void setFhirContext(FhirContext theContext)
        Sets the context associated with this client factory. Must not be called more than once.

        The default value for this setting is defined by IRestfulClientFactory.DEFAULT_SERVER_VALIDATION_MODE

        Specified by:
        setServerValidationMode in interface IRestfulClientFactory

        The default value for this setting is defined by IRestfulClientFactory.DEFAULT_SOCKET_TIMEOUT

        Specified by:
        setSocketTimeout in interface IRestfulClientFactory

      • resetHttpClient

        protected abstract void resetHttpClient()
        Reset the http client. This method is used when parameters have been set and a new http client needs to be created
